_pad Held

PadHeldTime HeldTime

Detailed Description

Structure holding a pad struct for each possible button state.

Member Data Documentation

_pad PADS::Held

Each value set to 1 represents a held button

PadHeldTime PADS::HeldTime

Length of time each button has been held

_pad PADS::Newpress

Each value set to 1 represents a newly pressed button

_pad PADS::Released

Inverse of held
